trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for all ASP.NET mobile control classes.
trans-unit.target: 提供所有 ASP.NET 行動裝置控制項類別的基底類別。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

trans-unit.source: As the base class for all ASP.NET mobile controls, the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl> class primarily contains style and context information common to all controls.
trans-unit.target: 作為所有 ASP.NET 行動控制項的基底類別<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl>類別主要是包含所有控制項通用的樣式和內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information about style and context information, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> and <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Form> classes.
trans-unit.target: 如需樣式和內容資訊的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>和<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Form>類別。

trans-unit.source: Because this class derives from the ASP.NET <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> base class, all <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> base class properties, methods, and events are available in each of the mobile controls.
trans-unit.target: 因為這個類別衍生自 ASP.NET<xref:System.Web.UI.Control>基底類別，所有<xref:System.Web.UI.Control>基底類別屬性、 方法和事件可用於每個行動控制項。

trans-unit.source: for operating in a hosted environment.
trans-unit.target: 用於裝載環境中的作業。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求值：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />，權限值：<see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />

trans-unit.source: Initializes the class for use by an inherited class instance.
trans-unit.target: 初始化這個類別，以供繼承的類別執行個體使用。

trans-unit.source: This constructor can only be called by an inherited class.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式只能由繼承的類別呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Returns the device-specific adapter for the control.
trans-unit.target: 針對控制項傳回裝置的特定配置器。

trans-unit.source: An adapter specific to the device on which the page will be displayed, which is also usually specific to the control.
trans-unit.target: 會顯示頁面之裝置的特定配接器，通常它也是控制項的特定配接器。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.IControlAdapter> instance returned is specific to the current <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.IControlAdapter>傳回執行個體是特定於目前<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl>物件。

trans-unit.source: Any child controls of the current control will use their specific adapter as well.
trans-unit.target: 將目前控制項的任何子控制項將會使用其特定介面卡以及。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Control" /> that has been added.
trans-unit.target: 已加入的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Control" />。

trans-unit.source: The index of the control in the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls" /> 集合中之控制項的索引。

trans-unit.source: Called after a child control is added to the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls" /> collection of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Control" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 在子控制項加入 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Control" /> 物件的 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls" /> 集合後呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The set of forms that contain links to the specified control.
trans-unit.target: 一組表單，其中包含指定控制項的連結。

trans-unit.source: Adds the set of forms that contains links to the specified control to the provided list.
trans-unit.target: 在提供的清單中加入一組表單，其中包含指定控制項的連結。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

trans-unit.source: When a form contains navigation elements that activate another form without interaction from the server, it is considered a linked form.
trans-unit.target: 當表單包含巡覽項目可啟動另一個表單，而不需從伺服器互動時，則會視為連結的表單。

trans-unit.source: There are several criteria for a form to be considered linked.
trans-unit.target: 有數個準則才會被視為表單連結。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the following three conditions are met, Form B is considered to be linked to Form A:
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果符合下列三個條件，表單 B 會被視為連結至表單：

trans-unit.source: Form A contains a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Link> with its destination as Form B.
trans-unit.target: 包含表單的<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Link>與表單 B.為其目的地

trans-unit.source: Form A does not contain an <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Form.OnDeactivate%2A> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 表單的不包含<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Form.OnDeactivate%2A>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Form B has no <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Form.OnActivate%2A> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 表單 B 沒有<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Form.OnActivate%2A>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The base implementation does nothing, but other controls, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Link>, override the default implementation.
trans-unit.target: 基底實作不做任何動作，但其他控制項，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Link>，覆寫預設實作。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents the parsed element.
trans-unit.target: 代表已剖析項目的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the server control that an element, either XML or HTML, was parsed, and adds the element to the server control's <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 通知伺服器控制項，XML 或 HTML 項目已剖析，並將項目加入伺服器控制項的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection" /> 物件中。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the specified alignment for the style.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定樣式的指定對齊方式。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Alignment.NotSet" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Alignment.NotSet" />。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

trans-unit.source: An enumerated value specifying the alignment for the style.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值，指定樣式的對齊方式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.Alignment%2A> property can be set to any of the following values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.Alignment%2A>屬性可以設定為下列值之一。

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: No alignment is set for the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 沒有對齊設定為指定的物件。

trans-unit.source: Aligns to the left.
trans-unit.target: 靠左對齊。

trans-unit.source: Aligns to the center.
trans-unit.target: 置中對齊。

trans-unit.source: Aligns to the right.
trans-unit.target: 靠右對齊。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> containing the control.
trans-unit.target: 包含控制項的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" />。

trans-unit.source: Applies the style properties defined in the page style sheet to the control.
trans-unit.target: 將頁面樣式表中所定義的樣式屬性套用至控制項。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl> class does not support theming.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl>類別不支援佈景主題。

trans-unit.source: If an attempt to call the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.ApplyStyleSheetSkin%2A> method is made, a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果嘗試呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.ApplyStyleSheetSkin%2A>方法由，<xref:System.NotSupportedException>就會擲回。

trans-unit.source: In all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情況下。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the specified background color for the style.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定樣式的指定背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Color.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Color.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

trans-unit.source: The specified background color for the style.
trans-unit.target: 樣式的指定背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the other properties, the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.BackColor%2A> property is not inherited from its parent.
trans-unit.target: 不同於其他屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.BackColor%2A>屬性不繼承自其父代。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.BackColor%2A> property to cyan on a parent control, a child control will not inherit a background color of cyan; you must explicitly set the child control's <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.BackColor%2A> property to cyan, or you must set the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.BackColor%2A> property of the parent control and apply the style sheet to the child control.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您設定<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.BackColor%2A>青色父控制項上，子控制項的屬性將不會繼承青色的背景色彩，則您必須明確設定子控制項的<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.BackColor%2A>屬性到青色、 或者您必須設定<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.BackColor%2A>屬性控制項的父事件並套用至子控制項的樣式表。

trans-unit.source: This is consistent with the behavior of cascading style sheets.
trans-unit.target: 這是與階層式樣式表的行為一致。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a property that determines whether an additional trailing break is rendered after the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定屬性，這個屬性決定控制項之後是否呈現其他尾端分行符號。

trans-unit.source: This break causes subsequent content to start on the next line.
trans-unit.target: 這個分行符號會使後續內容從下一行開始。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if an additional trailing break is rendered after the control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項之後會呈現其他尾端分行符號，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Do not set this property to `true` on a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Form> control.
trans-unit.target: 未設定這個屬性為`true`上<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Form>控制項。

trans-unit.source: If you set this property to `true`, the control will throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果您將此屬性設定為`true`，控制項將會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: This property is ignored by controls for which a trailing break does not make sense.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會忽略尾端分行符號毫無意義的控制項。

trans-unit.target: 下表列出支援的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.BreakAfter%2A>針對特定種類的裝置的屬性。

Set to <see langword="true" /> if the instantiated templates must bind to available data (which usually happens on the first request).
trans-unit.target: 如果具現化的範本必須繫結至可用的資料 (這通常發生在第一個要求)，則設定為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Set to <see langword="false" /> if the templates must not bind to data, and instead rely on view state to fill them in (which usually happens on subsequent postbacks).

trans-unit.target: 由裝置配接器呼叫來建立此控制項的預設範本化使用者介面 (UI)。

trans-unit.target: 繼承的類別可以覆寫此方法以傳回更特定的樣式類別。

trans-unit.target: 如果具現化 (Instantiated) 的樣板繫結至可用的資料 (通常發生在第一個要求上)，則會傳回 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.CreateTemplatedUI%2A> method of the corresponding control adapter, which can in turn call back the control's <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.CreateDefaultTemplatedUI%2A> method or create its own device-specific templated UI.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作會呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.CreateTemplatedUI%2A>之對應的控制項配接器，可以接著呼叫回控制項的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.CreateDefaultTemplatedUI%2A>方法或建立自己的裝置特定範本化 UI。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.FontInfo> class has the following properties.

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The font is bold.
trans-unit.target: 字型為粗體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the specified foreground color for the style.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定樣式的指定前景色彩。

trans-unit.source: Typically, this property sets the color for the text.
trans-unit.target: 通常這個屬性會設定文字的色彩。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Color.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Color.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.

trans-unit.source: The specified foreground color for the style.
trans-unit.target: 樣式的指定前景色彩。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.ForeColor%2A> property to display text in different colors for all the controls and classes listed in the Inheritance section that follows.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.ForeColor%2A>繼承一節中列出的屬性中的所有控制項和類別不同的色彩顯示文字。

trans-unit.source: For example, in the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.AdRotator>, setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.ForeColor%2A> property changes the color of the text in the control; in the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Calendar>, it changes the color of the text in the calendar; and in the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ValidationSummary>, it changes the color of the text of the error messages.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.AdRotator>，設定<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.ForeColor%2A>屬性變更的控制項; 中的文字色彩<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Calendar>，行事曆; 在和中，它會變更文字的色彩<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ValidationSummary>，它會變更的錯誤文字的色彩訊息。

trans-unit.source: The strings that can be used for colors are a set of fixed colors and hexadecimal RGB values.
trans-unit.target: 可用的色彩的字串會是一組固定的色彩和十六進位 RGB 值。

trans-unit.source: These values can also be specified in the form "#RRGGBB."
trans-unit.target: 這些值也可以指定格式"#RRGGBB。 」

trans-unit.source: For example, "#bb7023".
You can also use the Microsoft Windows color constants.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用 Microsoft Windows 色彩常數。

trans-unit.source: For specific details, see <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors>.
trans-unit.target: 特定的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors>。

trans-unit.source: the inner text contains markup tags at run time, and the derived control does not allow markup tags in inner text.

trans-unit.source: the value used to set this property contains new line characters and the derived control does not allow multiple lines of text.
trans-unit.target: 用來設定這個屬性的值包括新行字元，且衍生的控制項不允許多行文字。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if the control submits the form.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項會送出表單，則傳回 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control submits the form; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項送出表單則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Mobile controls, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command>, can override this method to determine whether this is a control used for form submission.
trans-unit.target: 行動控制項，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command>，可以覆寫這個方法來判斷是否這是用來以送出表單的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Other controls can be extended by providing logic to programmatically determine whether or not they must be `submit` controls, for example, by checking for specific properties.
trans-unit.target: 其他控制項可以透過提供以程式設計方式判斷是否必須是邏輯來擴充`submit`控制項，例如，藉由檢查特定屬性。

trans-unit.source: A control is considered to be a form-submit control only if it implements <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler> method to capture the postback event.
trans-unit.target: Form-submit 控制項，它會實作時，才會被視為控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler>方法來擷取回傳事件。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it is not registered for the default event handler, even if the method returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它不會註冊預設事件處理常式，即使該方法會傳回`true`。

trans-unit.source: To be considered templated, an object must have a [\<DeviceSpecific> element](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5984e67a-91cf-4f32-8815-7e7fab3d3b5b) with a [\<Choice> element](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c81bee77-bb45-4211-be0f-e13a040b3c2d) successfully evaluated for the target device.

trans-unit.source: If you have a link of the format "#form1" in a control contained in a user control, this method looks for a form with `id=form1` in the user control.
trans-unit.target: 如果您在連結的格式"#form1 「 使用者控制項中所含的控制項，這個方法會尋找的表單具有`id=form1`使用者控制項中。

trans-unit.source: If not found, it goes up the chain of any nested user controls, and then searches for the form on the page.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到，它會鏈結頂端的任何巢狀的使用者控制項，並會搜尋頁面上的表單。

trans-unit.source: Scoping rules walk up, not down, the chain.
trans-unit.target: 範圍規則查核行程往上、 不下，鏈結。

trans-unit.source: If you want to browse to a form that is contained in a user control, you must use the ":" syntax used by <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A> method to refer to the form.

trans-unit.source: In addition to information saved with the ordinary view state, ASP.NET mobile Web Forms store information such as whether or not the form is paginated.

trans-unit.source: This added information is stored in the private view state and is stored on the client rather than the server.

trans-unit.source: A private view state is saved in an optimized manner.
trans-unit.target: 私用檢視狀態會以最佳化方式儲存。

trans-unit.source: Default behavior, such as making the first form the active form, is never included in the saved private view state.
trans-unit.target: 預設行為，例如進行第一種形式的現用表單中，永遠不會包含在儲存的私用檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the style properties for a control.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.StyleReference%2A> property must be the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.Name%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style> object.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.StyleReference%2A>屬性必須是<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.Name%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style>物件。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.StyleReference%2A> property to share styles across controls, either by using inheritance or by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.StyleReference%2A> property of a style sheet.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.StyleReference%2A>要使用繼承，或使用共用整個控制項的樣式屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.StyleReference%2A>樣式表的屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the Styles documentation.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱樣式的文件。

trans-unit.source: To find out how to create a new style, see [Creating New Styles](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/da7f9825-3cc7-4c0f-9800-7d3cb15041d1).

trans-unit.source: This property is used for form pagination.

trans-unit.source: A value of -1 indicates that the default weight for the element must be used.
